title: Spatial and seasonal variability of chlorophyll-a, total suspended matter, and colored dissolved organic matter in the Sundarban mangrove forest using earth observation and field data
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Mosa. Tania Alim Shampa, Md. Kawser Ahmed, K. M. Azam Chowdhury, Md. Ashraful Islam, Mahmudul Hasan, Muhammad Shahinur Rahman, Md. Saiful Islam
